Usage:
1. Name the criterion (e.g., "Efficiency â€“ notification setup").
2. Link it to an ISO 9241-11 dimension and clause number.
3. Define a metric plus how you will measure it (tool, test type, etc.).
4. Add a benchmark and explain why it is acceptable for this release.
